answers.answer: Sometimes symptoms come and go, that is normal. The discharge doesn't sound like something to worry about.

it can come and go morning sickness that is and the discharge is normal i get that too and im 9 weeks today ! ive had both m/c and chemical and you bleed heavier than a period i think you are ok try not to stress . the first trimester is hard on any woman .

I agree with the other ladies on both answers. Don't stress relax as much as you can. I also know the worry. I've had 2 miscarriages. My third pregnancy I carried to 35 weeks he was born healthy but I had preeclampsia. So I advise eat healthy don't stress and walk and light exercise daily.

question: Yesterday I turned 7 weeks and my sore breasts, morning sickness, etc. All are gone now and I'm worried cause I also had this yellow brownish small discharge and now its gone. I had a mc last year in Nov. It was a chemical pregnancy. But this pregnancy is way differ. But is it normal not to have symtoms at 7weeks? What about the discharge?
title: help!!!
